author: William Yang, William Yang
title: 'Life will always find a way': China tries to shut down wildlife trade but markets remain open
description: Stop the Wildlife Trade: In February, China passed a law to outlaw all wildlife trade and consumption, but despite the government's efforts to weed out the possible source of the coronavirus outbreak, markets remain open across the country
content: Cordoned off by blue barricades and police lines, the once-bustling Huanan Seafood Market has suspended operation since 1 January, after dozens of customers fell ill to what we now know as the deadly virus Covid-19. The iconic sign that adorned the entrance o… [+4993 chars]
